events.name: Lithium-ion battery supply chain risks
events.wd_description: Assessment of supply chain risks for lithium-ion batteries, including mining, refining, and manufacturing stages.
events.description: Assessment of supply chain risks for lithium-ion batteries, including mining, refining, and manufacturing stages.

events.name: Mining
events.wd_description: Extraction of lithium and cobalt from ore.
events.description: Extraction of lithium and cobalt from ore.

events.name: Refining
events.wd_description: Processing of lithium and cobalt to produce high-purity materials.
events.description: Processing of lithium and cobalt to produce high-purity materials.

events.name: Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Assembly of lithium-ion batteries from refined materials.
events.description: Assembly of lithium-ion batteries from refined materials.

events.name: Lithium and cobalt risks
events.wd_description: Risks associated with the mining stages of lithium and cobalt extraction.
events.description: Risks associated with the mining stages of lithium and cobalt extraction.

events.name: Lithium risks
events.wd_description: Supply chain disruptions and environmental concerns related to lithium mining.
events.description: Supply chain disruptions and environmental concerns related to lithium mining.

events.name: Nickel and manganese risks
events.wd_description: Risks associated with the refining stages of nickel and manganese processing.
events.description: Risks associated with the refining stages of nickel and manganese processing.

events.name: Nickel risks
events.wd_description: Supply chain disruptions and environmental concerns related to nickel refining.
events.description: Supply chain disruptions and environmental concerns related to nickel refining.

events.name: Comprehensive risk safeguarding
events.wd_description: Emphasizing the need to identify and safeguard against risks comprehensively throughout the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Emphasizing the need to identify and safeguard against risks comprehensively throughout the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Risk identification
events.wd_description: Identifying risks throughout the entire supply chain of lithium-ion batteries to ensure steady consumption.
events.description: Identifying risks throughout the entire supply chain of lithium-ion batteries to ensure steady consumption.

events.name: Safeguarding strategies
events.wd_description: Developing strategies to safeguard against identified risks in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Developing strategies to safeguard against identified risks in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Database establishment
events.wd_description: Calling for the establishment and analysis of comprehensive databases to monitor and manage supply chain risks.
events.description: Calling for the establishment and analysis of comprehensive databases to monitor and manage supply chain risks.

events.name: Manganese supply risks
events.wd_description: Evaluating supply risks associated with manganese in the downstream stages of lithium-ion battery production.
events.description: Evaluating supply risks associated with manganese in the downstream stages of lithium-ion battery production.
